text:
Quikly | Detroit, MI | Ruby Software Engineer | Full-time | Onsite

VC-backed Detroit Startup started in 2012. Digital marketing platform that scales to over 50K unique visitors per minute. Work on Ruby, Go, and Angular apps with a small team of developers in downtown Detroit.

To apply: https://quikly.applytojob.com/apply/ScSIC7/Ruby-Software-Eng...
